heading: passage: douglas fairbanks jr.
subheading: douglas fairbanks jr., american leading man, producer, and businessman, has died at age 90. he was the son of the silent film star douglas fairbanks. although never achieving his father’s renown, he made 75 movies -- successfully following in his father’s footsteps as a handsome romantic lead. during world war ii he was the first u.s. commander of a british flotilla and received an honorary knighthood from king george vi. fairbanks' most famous screen roles were as the star of gunga din, sinbad the sailor, and * the prisoner of zenda.*
author: wired staff
text: douglas fairbanks jr., american leading man, producer, and businessman, has died at age 90. he was the son of the silent film star douglas fairbanks. although never achieving his father’s renown, he made 75 movies -- successfully following in his father’s footsteps as a handsome romantic lead. during world war ii he was the first u.s. commander of a british flotilla and received an honorary knighthood from king george vi. fairbanks' most famous screen roles were as the star of  gunga din, sinbad the sailor, and * the prisoner of zenda.*
